text: Gabriel James Byrne (born 12 May 1950) is an Irish actor, movie director, movie producer, writer and audiobook narrator. In 2008, Byrne won a Golden Globe Award. In movies, he is known for his roles in Excalibur (1981), Miller's Crossing (1990), The Usual Suspects (1995), Stigmata (1999), End of Days (1999), Spider (2002), Jindabyne (2006), Vampire Academy (2014) and The 33 (2015). Byrne co-wrote The Last of the High Kings (1996). Byrne has also produced several movies, including the Academy Award–nominated In the Name of the Father (1993). In television, Byrne is known for his role as Paul Weston in the HBO drama In Treatment (2008–2011). ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Gabriel Byrne profile, artforamnesty.org; accessed 11 August 2017 * Gabriel Byrne video interview, jewreview.net; accessed 11 August 2017 * Gabriel Byrne discusses his role on In Treatment , npr.org, 30 May 2009 * Gabriel Byrne tells of childhood sexual abuse, Guardian.co.uk, 19 January 2010 Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:Irish movie directors Category:Irish movie producers Category:Irish screenwriters Category:Actors from Dublin Category:Writers from Dublin
title: Gabriel Byrne
